japanese: あれ、もう花火全部やっちゃった？
translation: Oh, have we used up all the fireworks?

japanese:
たくさんあると思いましたが、
あっという間でしたね。
translation:
I thought there were a lot,
but it ran out so fast.

japanese: らいは、楽しめたか？
translation: Raiha, did you have fun?

japanese: うん、楽しかった！
translation: Yeah, I did!

japanese: 私もです！
translation: I did too!

japanese: 四葉は騒がしい花火ばかりやってたわね。
translation: Yotsuba, you were just making so much noise lighting them off.

japanese:
フータロー君。
最後に打ち上げ花火やるから準備手伝ってくれる？
translation:
Futaro-kun.
I'm gonna set off the last firework,
so can you help me prepare it?

japanese: ん？　まだ残ってたのか？
translation: Hm? There's still one more?

japanese:
最後にやろうと思って別にしておいたんだ。
花火大会の締め括りに相応しいでしょ？
translation:
I saved that one for last.
It's the perfect way to end the fireworks show, right?

japanese:
そういうことか。
ああ、準備は任せろ。
translation:
Oh, so that's why there was still one left.
Okay, leave preparations to me.

japanese:
よし、俺が点火するから
お前は向こうでみんなと見てろ。
translation:
Alright, I'll light it,
you go join the others.

japanese: うん、よろしく。
translation: Yup, okay.

japanese:
じゃあ、いくぞー！
――それ！
translation:
Okay, here we go!
%p-2;――%p; And THERE!

japanese: たーまやー♪
translation: Oooooohh, aaaaaahh... ♪

japanese: 今年も、全員揃って花火を見れましたね。
translation:
We were able to see fireworks together this year,
too.

japanese:
なに言ってんのよ。
これはこれでいいものだけど、本番はまだでしょ？
translation:
What are you saying?
It was nice but it's not over.
We still haven't done the best one yet.

japanese: また、みんなでお出かけしよう。
translation: We should do something like this again.

japanese:
今年は私も、しっかりと
スケジュール調整しておくから。
translation: I'll make sure to manage my schedule better this year.

japanese: うんっ！　楽しみだね！
translation: Okay! I'm so excited!

japanese:
（この打ち上げ花火……
　やっぱり、イマイチ冴えないよなぁ）
translation:
(These fireworks...
 They were kinda underwhelming.)

japanese:
（確か去年、こいつらと公園で見た
　打ち上げ花火もこんなもんだったか）
translation: (But these are the same fireworks we saw in the park last year.)

japanese:
（会ったばかりのあの頃はどうなることかと思ったが
　この１年の間に、俺たちの関係も
　ずいぶんと変わった）
translation:
(When we first met, I was worried if we'd get along,
 but we've gotten to know each other quite a lot within this past year.)

japanese: （きっと、そのせいなんだろうな）
translation: (It's the same with the fireworks.)

japanese:
（同じくらい冴えない花火なのに
　今はあのときよりずっと綺麗に思えるのは……）
translation:
(The fireworks are just as lackluster as last year,
 but they seem so much more beautiful now,
 than they were back then...)
